intent: configuration files has to be retrieved from central media server.
Pull custom monitoring tools from the local network department.
For IoT devices integrated into the campus network, access to platforms hosting video streaming services must be denied.
targets: IoT devices integrated into the campus network

intent: Keep a record of real-time data throughput per device related to personal laptops in the faculty network.
targets: personal laptops in the faculty network

intent: Identifique dispositivos móveis que suportam compatibilidade com VPN
Notify devices in the quality assurance lab that a secure peer-to-peer file sharing service critical firmware updates is ready.

targets: devices in the quality assurance lab

intent: Real-time data throughput per device associated with research lab computers needs to be tracked.
Streaming services must have priority in the network, supply it with download speed greater than 100mbps streaming services should be given preference.
For devices connected via the staff-only network, access to community forums and discussion boards must be denied.
targets: devices connected via the staff-only network

intent: Detect IoT devices that are compatible with firewall configuration.
